alert.note: Alert for Clay; Randolph (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 03 at 10:23PM CDT until May 03 at 11:45PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: The National Weather Service in Birmingham has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Randolph County in east central Alabama... East central Clay County in east central Alabama... * Until 1145 PM CDT. * At 1022 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Lineville, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Public. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Lineville, Ashland, Wedowee, Lake Wedowee, Woodland, Barfield, Tennant, Big Springs, Ofelia and Napoleon. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
